This is a revolutionary game that has impacted the gaming industry, you should probably play it :)

Still holds up so many year later! Although I regret not know about the HL2: Update that's a rework of graphics until I was finished with the game. So if you're still looking to go back and play this, it's worth it but try that version first!

The half-life series has an unreplicable atmosphere and immersion that was miles and miles ahead of other contemporary games, and this instalment is the prime example of that. Half-Life 2, much like Half-Life 1, is a classic that actually earns every bit of its fame.

10/10

Great game. Great story. Doesn't overuse cutscenes. Despite being an old game, the graphics are still great and the gameplay is balanced. My second favourite game. garrys mod being my favourite of all time.

I always wanted to write a review and now it is the time. This game is the summit of the gaming industry. A 2004 game which can be still played today vanilla and still be interesting and not looking like a 17 year old game. Great storytelling by Valve enriched with the great Source engine. Everyone who plays games should and must play this game at least once. This is the history and revolution of FPS-Story based gaming. The undoubtful optimization of this game even in the highest end or the lowest end PC's is absolutely incredible. You can have RTX 3080 or GT 720 you can play this game without FPS drops or bugs. This game is fictionally and mechanically one of the best of its time and can be still played with joy. Half-Life is the beginning and it will be best game of all time for me.
